name: Arcade Ahri
description:
Controls

Spacebar = start/jump

q = cast orb of deception

w = cast fox fire

e = cast charm

r = cast sprit rush

q destroys blue minions

w destroys blue minions, red minions, and violet minions

e destroys red minions

r destroys blue minions , red minions, violet minions and makes ahri go fast
